page.title: 07LIVING IN LETWELL
page.content: I get up and go down stairs for breakfast. Then I'd hear the noise of the{tractors on their days work.Then I climb over the fence and up Natasha and Alexia's drive. Their dog would run out of their conservatory barking It makes me gulp a bit and I have to say" Hello Captain".I then knock on the door. Then we go and play poole while Alexia's getting ready.We play around and dare each other to go in the farm yard.At half past one,I am called for my dinner and I hear all the{same familiar sounds,My brother playing his tapes,my mum cooking and my dad typing and I sit down for dinner and about half an hour later I'll go out to play.At 6.oopm I go in for my tea and after tea I watch tv and at 9.00 I go to bed and read. Susan Liddle Age 11
